QuestData.Title: Learning to Leave and Return: the Magical Way
QuestData.Description: Just in case you don't already know, you can use the crystal on the platform behind me to teleport to the Violet Stand in Crystalsong Forest beneath Dalaran.$B$BCorrespondingly, you can use the crystal at the stand below to return to the chamber above me.$B$BI would like for you to do this now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Archmage Celindra at The Violet Gate in Dalaran wants you to use the Teleport to Violet Stand Crystal and the Teleport to Dalaran Crystal.
QuestData.CompletionText: I sense that you haven't yet tested out both of the teleport crystals.$B$BThat's alright, take your time.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, $c. Now you know the way to get down to Crystalsong Forest and also how to return.

Objectives.Objective: Teleport to Violet Stand Crystal used
